name: db
description: Easy access to dynamo, ds, mongodb, redis
readme:
This module sponsored by [Sleepless Inc. (sleepless.com)](http://sleepless.com/)

This will hopefully have a common interface for the
"least common denominator" functions of each NoSQL db soon.

To support:

	AWS DynamoDB
	MongoDB


API
	ListTables
	CreateTable
	DescribeTable
	UpdateTable
	DeleteTable
	PutItem
	GetItem
	UpdateItem
	BatchGetItem
	DeleteItem
	Query
	Scan
